algorithm_technique: Sort box types by units per box in descending order.
Greedily pick boxes with the most units until the truck is full.
problem_summary_simple: Maximize the total units of boxes loaded onto a truck with a limited capacity.
problem_summary_technical: Sort box types by units per box descending, then greedily fill the truck.
key_insights: The problem is a classic greedy approach: prioritize items with the highest value-to-weight ratio (units per box).
Sorting by units per box is the key to the greedy strategy.
Handle the case where the truck capacity is less than the number of boxes of a certain type.
